Sentencas: In this paper, the behavior of a grid-connected hybrid ac/dc microgrid has been investigated.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: Different renewable energy sources-photovoltaics modules and a wind turbine generator-have been considered together with a solid oxide fuel cell and a battery energy storage system.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: The main contribution of this paper is the design and the validation of an innovative online-trained artificial neural network-based control system for a hybrid microgrid.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: Adaptive neural networks are used to track the maximum power point of renewable energy generators and to control the power exchanged between the front-end converter and the electrical grid.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: Moreover, a fuzzy logic-based power management system is proposed in order to minimize the energy purchased from the electrical grid.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: The operation of the hybrid microgrid has been tested in the MATLAB/Simulink environment under different operating conditions.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid

Sentencas: The obtained results demonstrate the effectiveness, the high robustness and the self-adaptation ability of the proposed control system.
Titulo: Adaptive Neural Network-Based Control of a Hybrid AC/DC Microgrid
